Class CLIController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw2024polellipozziquartieritessera.ingsw2024polellipozziquartieritessera.network.client.CLIController
public class CLIController extends Object
Class that manage cli printings and cli actions

      Restarts the pong mechanism with the given server, client, and client container.
      Parameters:
      server - the VirtualServer instance
      client - the VirtualView instance
      clientContainer - the Client instance which contains the common implementations between VirtualViews

      public void manageInput(VirtualServer server, VirtualView client, Client clientContainer, String[] message) throws RemoteException
      Manages the input from the client.
      Parameters:
      server - the VirtualServer instance
      client - the VirtualView instance
      clientContainer - the Client instance
      message - the input message
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote error occurs

      Sends a ping to the server.
      Parameters:
      client - the VirtualView instance that sends the ping
